overview: The Law of Moises is a family adventure comedy film about MOISES ("moi-'sez") who since the death of his parents at the age of nine has only dreamt of one thing - getting out of Cairo, Illinois, a stifling 9 square-mile town, to make his own films that will change the world. Similar to his namesake -Moses 2,000 years earlier- our hero, Moises suffers from a speech impediment and anger issues. The similarities don't stop there - in the town, there seems to be BLOOD flowing in the Mississippi River. Other plagues follow, including frogs and locusts that aim to devour the town's historic landmarks.
tagline: A talented young filmmaker desperate to escape his small town discovers his destiny is to save it.
title: The Law of Moises
